t: Amazon.com : Got Glamour Micro Slant Hair & Eyebrow Tweezer, Stainless Steel, Made in USA : Beauty & Personal Care
s: That said, I would give 5 stars to Got Glamour for customer service. They are very attentive to customer satisfaction, contacting you right away to see if you are satisfied with your purchase. In my experience, companies usually wait for some kind of complaint before communicating beyond the selling point. ... I bought tweezers a couple months ago that I liked but I noticed they weren't as good as I first got them so I tried a new brand...
